name: places/ChIJJb1hVsVZwokRhVwKXiiDem4
formattedAddress: 340 Madison Ave 19 FLR, New York, NY 10173, USA
adrFormatAddress: 340 Madison Ave 19 FLR, New York, NY 10173, USA

originalText.text: This place is by far the WORST EMPLOYER I EVER WORKED FOR . I stress this matter to them they responds are horrible I have screenshots and proof that they don’t pay on time nor do they pay at all . They owe me 230 dollars and was never paid I have receipts & emails . Everything & legal action will be taken . Fed ex misplaced a package or something they made me drive hours away to see about a package that I already sent off & also have a receipt showing I sent it off . I was never paid for that ! Then once I bought it to they attention still never got paid . And now I can’t login in the app . They are not returning any calls . I am currently in the hospital so I can’t do anything . This is ridiculous. I do not recommend working for this company . I worked for them for a while and had troubles since day one bellow I attached two screenshots of me & the supervisor the one is the amount that was on my website. I did not receive neither one .  .

originalText.text: I've worked for Best Shop for over 6 months. Never a problem with payment. Things sometimes don't go according to plan as with most things in life. The true test is how one deals with it. So far they have been professional and courteous. Only one package has gone 'missing' to date. I did get the feeling they thought I had stolen it. But I know from my own packages that delivery drivers drop off to wrong addresses all the time. Plus, be aware of 'porch pirates' that follow delivery drivers to steal. Set up systems to combat this. I can't begin to understand the business model but I'm glad for the opportunity to earn a little extra cash whilst looking after my disabled wife. SAdly have had to downgrade to 1 star as they are now cheating me out of $120. Three dates have now passed where they said the money would be deposited. I can tell it never will now. They are just messing me around. I found out their Madison office is not true as a letter came back saying no one there. Their computer system went down and I thought they were hacked so I contacted one of the sellers of a product I had in my possession. They told me others had also called and some where sending their product back. The spokesperson seemed to think that so many pumps going out might be an attempt to circumvent sanctions on rogue states since products are 10 times more expensive abroad. If you do business with them take one package for yourself and say a porch pirate took it. They are so bad they can't prove anything. This way you'll at least have some compensation when they finally try to screw you which they will.

originalText.text: If you receive the packages, upload everything your suppose to. Then you will receive a label to print off to immediately get your package shipped out. After upload your receipt and bam your money goes into your earnings. Its very simple and you get paid every other week no problem! I've had no problems one bit with this company! They pay you to help them so don't steal from them! If you read the fine print  you will understand that or you will go to jail! Thank you Best Shop USA for giving me the opportunity to make some extra money on the side.

originalText.text:
Definitely a scam. They use your identity for scams. They then send you packages that they make you "forward" for out of country clients... Except none ever go out of country... Most go to Amazon and are sold to people... Using stolen cards.

Eventually they asked me to do a bitcoin atm transaction and the first time it world out fine but then they somehow involved my PayPal and did a backcharge of 12k.

If you do work be careful and NEVER do "side jobs". But best to avoid them completely.

originalText.text: I was also scammed by this company. At first they were not trying to pay me for the packages, I had to hold packages hostage and then they started paying me consistently. After about two months working for them, the so called Vicky Edwards person will offer you a Bitcoin "task" where they will send you money to your bank account and they instruct you to turn it into Bitcoin and give you 6%. I completed the transaction and a week later i got a call from my bank saying I need to bring back that money. These packages are scetchy too I opened a police report.
